name: Commercial Photorealism
description: High-end product or portrait style with tack-sharp focus and natural textures.
prompt: Raw photo of {{subject}}, extreme detail, visible skin pores, 8k resolution, shot on 35mm lens, f/1.8, natural lighting, highly realistic textures, no airbrushing.

name: Cinematic Neo-Noir
description: Moody, high-contrast style with dramatic lighting and a film-still aesthetic.
prompt: Cinematic film still of {{subject}}, anamorphic lens, high contrast, heavy shadows, teal and orange color grading, misty atmosphere, rim lighting, 4k, moody aesthetic.

name: Studio Ghibli Inspired
description: Nostalgic, hand-painted anime style with lush environments and soft colors.
prompt: Studio Ghibli style illustration of {{subject}}, hand-painted texture, lush scenery, soft pastel color palette, whimsical atmosphere, high-detail cel-shading, Joe Hisaishi vibe.

name: SaaS Modern Flat Design
description: Clean, vector-based style ideal for tech landing pages and app icons.
prompt: Minimalist vector illustration of {{subject}}, flat design, clean lines, bold geometric shapes, solid color background, professional tech aesthetic, Adobe Illustrator style, 2D.

name: Cyberpunk 2026
description: Neon-infused, futuristic aesthetic with rainy textures and high-tech elements.
prompt: Cyberpunk aesthetic, {{subject}}, neon magenta and cyan lighting, rainy city street background, glowing accents, hyper-detailed tech, volumetric fog, futuristic urban vibe.

name: Retro 90s Fujifilm
description: Candid, nostalgic film look with organic grain and slightly faded colors.
prompt: Candid 90s disposable camera shot of {{subject}}, Fujifilm Superia 400 stock, heavy film grain, slight motion blur, flash photography, nostalgic aesthetic, lo-fi textures.

name: Isometric 3D Render
description: Toy-like, miniature style often used for icons or architectural visualizations.
prompt: Isometric 3D render of {{subject}}, Octane render, soft clay textures, vibrant colors, tilt-shift effect, miniature world aesthetic, clean lighting, high resolution.

name: Dark Fantasy Oil Painting
description: Classical fine art style with heavy brushstrokes and a somber, epic mood.
prompt: Oil painting of {{subject}}, dark fantasy style, heavy impasto brushstrokes, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, weathered canvas texture, epic composition, classical art influence.
